channel.title: Port forward or server?
channel.description: Well I had problems with my ISP for about 1 month. I phoned them and they told me to follow their steps carefully, so I did. They said any ports you forwarded will be deleted I said that's fine I know how to port forward I done it for years. So I done as he said to speed my download speed up and it worked, but now every time I try and port forward it will not let me. Any ideas?

item.title: Port forward or server?
